DOC.brief_summary: The study is to test a decision aid that is designed to help patients make decision regarding management of their gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD). Once the decision aid is constructed we will test and assess the aid on ~100 patients who have GERD to assess effectiveness.
DOC.brief_title: Decision Aid for Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease Management
DOC.criteria: Patients with GERD, Age at least 18, Able to give consent Unable to perform decision aid on a computer
